settings.title: Skin Rejuvenation & Hydration
settings.content: Boost collagen production, reduce inflammation, and enhance moisture retention for radiant and youthful skin.

settings.title: Hair Growth & Vitality
settings.content: Fortify your strands with essential nutrients for thicker hair, minimizing breakage, and promoting natural shine.

settings.title: Nail Strength & Health
settings.content: Eliminate brittleness and promote nail growth with bioavailable nutrients, ensuring robust and healthy nails.

settings.title: Anti-Inflammation & Immune Support
settings.content: Combat skin inflammation and boost immune function with essential peptides and fatty acids, promoting overall well-being.

settings.title: Enhanced Nutrient Delivery
settings.content: Nourish your beauty from the inside out, with highly bioavailable micronutrients critical for skin, hair, and nail health.

IS THE SKIN, HAIR & NAILS STACK FOR ME?

This stack is tailor-made for those who understand that true beauty begins from within, delivering vital nutrients to enhance your natural radiance.

settings.quote: My hair and nails feel and look better, thicker, and stronger after only one month.
settings.author: Jaclyn F.

settings.supporting_product_description: Gut & Digestion includes tripe (stomach), intestines, pancreas, liver, and spleen. It provide strategic support for gut inflammation and digestion.
Firestarter includes suet (perinephric kidney fat) and helps to increase energy, improve exercise performance, mood, insulin sensitivity, and mitochondrial fat burning.

settings.primary_product_description: Skin, Hair & Nails is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to support healthy (and beautiful) skin, hair, and nails. Grass-fed & finished cartilage, liver, and bone marrowstimulate collagen production and reduce inflammation.

settings.title: Full-spectrum collagen (Type I-V & XI)
settings.nutrient_description: Bovine-derived collagen is critical in supporting and maintaining the overall health of your joints, skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Fat-soluble Vitamins A & E
settings.nutrient_description: Necessary for optimal skin health, protection against dryness, and wound healing.

settings.title: Glycine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid that supports collagen production, stimulation, and acts as a natural moisturizing factor.

settings.title: Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Protects cells from damage and water loss as well as improves moisture retention for our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Hyaluronan (Hyaluronic Acid)
settings.nutrient_description: Controls tissue hydration, mediates repair processes, protects and lubricates soft tissues.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12, and Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for structural integrity of skin, hair, and nails, reducing inflammation, and collagen production.

settings.title: Proteoglycan
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for structural development, organization, hydration, and functional properties of the skin.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, nourishing skin cells, as well as reducing inflammation.

settings.title: Elastin
settings.nutrient_description: Promotes strength, firmness, and elasticity of our skin.

settings.title: Glycosaminoglycans
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for maintenance, regeneration, and regulation of our cells that comprise our skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Red and Yellow Bone Marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Alpha defensins 5 and 6
settings.nutrient_description: Antimicrobial peptides involved in the immune response.

settings.title: Gastrin-releasing Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as GPR, this peptide is found in pancreatic tissue and supports digestive processes by stimulating the release of enzymes, bicarbonate, and fluids.

settings.title: Manganese
settings.nutrient_description: A vital mineral involved in antioxidant defense (Super Oxide Dismutase), thyroid function, bone health, blood sugar regulation, as well as wound healing and collagen production.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Exclusively found in splenic tissue which enhances immune function.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Niacin
settings.nutrient_description: A B3 vitamin essential for cardiovascular health, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Copper and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Lipase, Protease, and Amylase
settings.nutrient_description: Enzymes to help break down macronutrients like fat, protein and carbohydrates.

settings.title: Colipase, Trypsin, and Pancreatic Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Support the activation of enzymes needed to break down protein and help with food allergies by improving digestion.

settings.title: Stearic Acid
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial fatty acid that turns on mitochondrial fat-burning cells to help with weight and energy.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Skin, Hair & Nails, Gut & Digestion, and Firestarter includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: ...helped tremendously, and I have seen major  growth and strength in my nails. My skin is definitely clearer.
settings.author: Kristi R.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: The unique combination of organs within this stack provides synergistic support towards healthier hair, skin, and nails.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Skin, Hair & Nails Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is intended for those seeking comprehensive nutritional support to nourish their beauty from the inside out.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal skin, hair and nail health.
